unnormalised: Payment gateways, eh? More like payment GATEKEEPERS sometimes! Trying to choose one feels like surviving a Delhi traffic jam during Diwali. So many options, each promising smooth sailing, but you end up stuck anyway. Hope my customers have better luck paying for my amazing biryani than I had integrating this thing. Wish me luck, Jai Hind!
